description: Lions are large social cats known for living in prides and being apex predators.
Tigers are the largest living cats, recognized by their orange coats with black stripes.
Elephants are the largest land animals, known for their intelligence, trunks, and tusks.
Zebras are African herbivores known for their distinctive black-and-white striped coats.
Dogs are domesticated mammals known for their loyalty, intelligence, and companionship with humans.
Cats are small domesticated carnivores valued for their agility and independent behavior.
Bears are large mammals with strong builds, found in diverse habitats across the northern hemisphere.
Wolves are highly social carnivores that live and hunt in organized packs.
Deer are herbivorous mammals known for males growing antlers and their agile movement.

origin: Africa, Asia, Central and South America
description: Monkeys are intelligent primates known for social behavior and dexterity.
